item.description:
This will probably end up being a repeated daytime event if we have good response from those who are free to walk during a weekday. You're welcome to bring dogs (I run mine offleash in this area), but you're welcome without them, as well :D

We'll probably do a loop of about an hour. Most of the footing is dry dirt road or old pavement, although there are plenty of ponds, puddles and inlets for dogs to splash around in.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the parking lot at the end of the cul-de-sac (by the sign).
item.why: Thursday is supposed to be nice after rain earlier in the week, and it'll be nice to stretch the legs :)

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: 11 O'clock Dog Walk (Humans welcome, too!)
